title: Runes bug
body:
Ive been doing some Rune Combining and ended up with 11 armor marks but can't use the rune combiner to get rid of the left over 2. 
Help pls I wana make more runes.

The 2 left over armor marks on the side : http://puu.sh/dpZMG/67d45de38a.jpg
Rune combiner cant find the runes : http://puu.sh/dpZMW/90f26ccd26.jpg

replies.body: What's your purchase log say? Maybe it's just a bug?
